title: Apply for Energy Efficiency Rebate
description: A customer has purchased a new energy-efficient air conditioner and wants to apply for a $100 rebate.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's account and explain the eligibility requirements for the rebate program.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer is eligible and explains they need proof of purchase.

tasks.description: Guide the customer on how to upload their purchase receipt and the product's model number through the online portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for the customer to complete the application.

tasks.description: Once the documents are uploaded, process the rebate application, which will be applied as a credit on the customer's next bill.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the application and confirms the credit will appear on the next statement.
